"About Katana Gear":
"When you learn the skill \"Katana Gear\", a Gear Gauge is added to the top of the Weapon Palette.

The Gear Gauge fills as you hit enemies with Katana attacks."

"As the Gear Gauge fills, you will deal more damage with Katanas, and the range of your Just Counter attacks will increase.

When the Gear Gauge has reached stage 3, performing a Just Counter will release your Gear, giving you a power boost and critical hit rate increase for a short time."
